name: Online multiplayer pong
description: Once 2 players are connected, you'll be able to play a game of pong. Covid 19 boredom project, couldn't find any multiplayer pong game online to play with my friends so I made one myself using firebase and the JS canvas API.
instructions: Press the <kbd>RESET BALL</kbd> button to start. Move up and down with <kbd>W</kbd> and <kbd>S</kbd>. NOTE: Another player needs to connect in order for the ball to bounce.
